title: The Bachelor's Abbie Chatfield opens up about steamy kiss with Todd King
text:
Abbie Chatfield was recently spotted enjoying a passionate kiss on the beach with The Bachelorette's Todd King.

But the Bachelor runner-up has denied the pair are official, saying they've only been 'on a couple of dates' together so far.

Appearing on the podcast Outspoken, Abbie brushed off negative comments about the steamy display and said: 'He's very hot, leave me alone.'

Beach babe! Bachelor runner-up Abbie Chatfield (pictured) has denied the pair are official, saying they've been 'on a couple of dates'

The 24-year-old was talking to the show's hosts about her experience with internet trolls and the speculation surrounding her new love interest.

She said: 'We aren't dating. We had two dates. We just pashed [kissed] on a couple of dates.

'I'm just a normal chick on a beach with a friend on a date getting to know someone.'

Hot stuff! Todd King (pictured) was recently spotted enjoying a passionate kiss on the beach with The Bachelorette's Todd King

But the happy duo certainly looked smitten with each other as they put on a tactile display while on a mini-break in Noosa, Queensland.

After their raunchy splash in the ocean, the pair kissed again as they soaked up the sun on a shared beach towel.

The lovebirds were also spotted on another occasion, packing on the PDA over a romantic lunch in Queensland.

It's not the first time Abbie has spoken out about rumours of a relationship with Todd.

Beach ready: Abbie used her social media to clarify the situation with the handsome 26-year-old, Todd

On Monday, she used her social media to clarify the situation with the handsome 26-year-old.

Replying to comments on her latest Instagram post, where she called out trolls, the blonde beauty responded to a follower who assumed they were together.

'Hahaha we aren’t!,' she replied. 'Very good friends but we live on opposite sides of the country.'

Abbie finished runner-up in the most recent Bachelor series starring Matt Agnew while Todd also finished runner-up on Ali Oetjen's season.
description: Abbie Chatfield was recently spotted enjoying a passionate kiss on the beach with The Bachelorette's Todd King.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
